Mastering Cyber Risk Management, from assessment to mitigation

A specialist Cyber Security Assessment and security consultant organisation. Redbelts principal service is the proprietary Cyber Security Risk Assessment, giving a unique insight into organisation’s cyber threat level and equally importantly, their defence level. Accompanying this service is Redbelts’ Virtual CISO and Penetration Testing services.

Exposures

Risk-Unawareness

Organisations facing an incomplete understanding of Cyber threat and defence postures.

Advanced Threats

A continuing, ever developing set of unknown Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures (TTPs).

Inefficient Security

Cyber Security business requirements, without accompanying dedicated budget/personal and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).

Services

Redbelts specialise in providing the below solutions to these exposures.

Third-Party Risk Assessment

A proprietary assessment assisting to gain an understanding of organisation’s cyber threat and defence levels in greater detail.

Penetration Testing

Identifying known and unknown vulnerabilities in external and internal environments.

Virtual CISO

A tiered offering designed to provide top-tier security experts and their expertise available to all organisations.


Below outlines RedBelts’ services in greater details


Third-Party Risk Assessment

RedBelts specialise in two Cyber Security Risk Assessment offerings


Specific and tailored to the insurance underwriting industry RedBelts provides assessments specific to Insurer’s underwriting portfolio. These assist in understandinging their client’s threat and defence levels, complimenting their underwriting models and assisting in understand their portfolio exposures in greater detail. The Assessment provides insights that are immediately actionable which will reduce an Insured’s probability of a loss event. Our Assessment’s allow Underwriters and Actuaries to:

- Provide information on areas of risk and exposure that an insured can identify and improve upon, mitigating the potential risk/exposure to an insured’s overall book and improve profitability.

- Provide additional insight into the potential likelihood of loss.

- Measure and Benchmark risks in a consistent and objective manner.

Direct to organisations our assessments allow organisations to gain a better understanding, of their Cyber Defence and Threat levels and directly mitigate these Cyber risks and exposures.



Penetration Testing

RedBelts’ specialise in the Penetration Testing of Cloud Infrastructure, System, Web and Mobile application to identify vulnerabilities that could allow adversaries access to your systems and data.

Our security experts use a combination of manual and automated techniques to find weaknesses. Once identified, the pentester will attempt to exploit the vulnerabilities to see what additional access, information and privileges can be gained.


Virtual CISO (vCISO)

Our virtual Chief Information Security Officer service tiered offering is designed to provide frameworks and dashboards to organisations who need security expertise and guidance.







About Red Belts

RedBelts is a specialist Cyber Security Risk Assessment and security consultant organisation. Our principal and proprietary Cyber Security Risk Assessment gives a unique insight into not only an organisation’s cyber threat level but also equally importantly, their current defence level. Our proprietary approach gives a true insight into an organisation’s cyber/privacy exposure. Accompanying our Assessment service is our market leading Virtual CISO and Penetration Testing offerings, giving organisations the capacity to master their cyber risk management, on an ongoing basis.


Unlike alternative offerings, RedBelts’ services are not fully automated meaning the substantial expertise of the Redbelt’s team is fully utilised.



Expertise

RedBelts is co-founded by two Cyber Security and Insurance/Law experts.

With 15 and 10 years of experience in their respective industries, working with some of the largest organisations within these industries.

The RedBelt’s team bring a unique and new approach to Cyber Risk, assessments and services.



The RedBelts’ team brings a unique and new approach to Cyber Risk, assessments and services.
